title: Baja_1000-PROCYON
description:
======================================================
--------------------------------------------Introduction-------------------------------------------
======================================================


>> Publisher : 
>> Developer : 
>> Release Date : 
>> Genre: 

Description :

SCORE International Baja 1000 recreates the unforgiving
conditions and blistering speeds that make this event the
most recognized and entertaining off-road racing event in
the world. Sporting over 90 vehicles across multiple classes
in the real Baja 1000 including trophy trucks, class I,
motorcycles, ATVs and more the game challenges players to
not only be first across the finish line, but also keep their
machine intact. Hyper-realistic dirt and damage modeling in
the game means players need to be crazy enough to take chances,
but not so reckless that their vehicle is destroyed before the
race is over.

======================================================
-------------------------------------Screenshots / Videos-----------------------------------
======================================================



======================================================
-------------------------------------System Requirements----------------------------------
======================================================

Minimum:
OS: Windows XP/Vista/7
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.6GHz, AMD Phenom X3 8750
RAM: 2 Gb
Video Memory: 512 MB
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT or ATI Radeon HD 4850
Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
DirectX: 9.0c
Hard Drive: 1 GB free

Recommended:
OS: Windows 7
Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.7 GHz or better, AMD Phenom II X4 3 GHz or better
RAM: 4 Gb
Video Memory: 1 Gb
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or ATI Radeon HD 5850 or better
Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
DirectX: 9.0c
Hard Drive: 1 GB free

======================================================
----------------------------------Installation Information---------------------------------
======================================================

1. Burn/Mount
2. Install
3. Play!
